name: Chaos War
description:
game introduction
"Chaos War" is a medieval 2.5D barrage shooter Rogue Like game. He will continue to grow with your expeditions.

Operation introduction:
Use W-A-S-D to operate the front, back, left and right of the witch

Use the E key to interact

Shoot with the left mouse button

Game Features

1. The map is randomly generated

2. There are many kinds of magic books

3. Random monsters

4. Merchant promotion system

In all random circumstances, you can continue to grow to improve your magic for a more comfortable experience
